subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: It seems to be dawning on Johnson only now that by matching Cale Yarborough’s three straight Cup titles, he and his race team have become a sports powerhouse.
snippet: It seems to be dawning on Johnson only now that by matching Cale Yarborough’s three straight Cup titles, he and his race team have become a sports powerhouse.
